about_the_game:
This is the first free DLC for the fresh body.


As Thomas explored the island in depth, he found many strange places. Why are there so many monsters on the island?
Why do you see some strange sights?
Why did the sister become that way?
How can Thomas leave the island?
Think very carefully ...
And how did his strange base come from, why are there so many survivors here?
If you want to find the answers to these questions, come and play!

Content Introduction


  • The Secret lab scene is open.
  • 15 new enemies.
  • 42 new limbs.

  • The new story that was opened after sister was rescued.
  • Unlock the secret of the base.
detailed_description:
This is the first free DLC for the fresh body.


As Thomas explored the island in depth, he found many strange places. Why are there so many monsters on the island?
Why do you see some strange sights?
Why did the sister become that way?
How can Thomas leave the island?
Think very carefully ...
And how did his strange base come from, why are there so many survivors here?
If you want to find the answers to these questions, come and play!

Content Introduction


  • The Secret lab scene is open.
  • 15 new enemies.
  • 42 new limbs.

  • The new story that was opened after sister was rescued.
  • Unlock the secret of the base.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6.6 or later
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory

name: Fresh Body - The Secret

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.00+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 256 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
